content.rendered:
Main, Regional & Military Campuses

Jennifer Brace, University Certifying Official, Administrative Assistant
805-986-6903
vareg@laverne.edu

Alexis Salud , University Certifying Official, Registration and VA Specialist
909-448-4416
vareg@laverne.edu

Mike Delvalle, Director of Academic Services, University Certifying Official
vareg@laverne.edu

 

For questions or information regarding eligibility to receive VA or DOD education benefits, or for current pay rates please click here.  For more detailed information, contact the Department of Veterans Affairs at (888) 442-4551 by using https://ask.va.gov
